product_name: REI Tri-Power Safety Whistle - Neon Green
long_description: The REI Tri-Power safety whistle is an extra-loud essential to have on you during outdoor activities in case you need to alert rescuers in an emergency. Endorsed by the National Association for Search and Rescue; also meets U.S. Coast Guard and Safety of Life at Sea (SOLAS) requirements. Metal clip with key ring allows you to attach the whistle to a life jacket, pack or zipper; mouthpiece allows hands-free use. Three-chamber design produces different pitches and blasts up to 120 decibels. Made of high-visibilty, non-corroding ABS plastic for durability. REI Tri-Power safety whistle also meets anti-choking standards for children.
short_description: The REI Tri-Power safety whistle is an extra-loud essential to have on you during outdoor activities in case you need to alert rescuers in an emergency.
